text.font-family: 'Hanken Grotesk', 'Hanken Grotesk SemiBold', Hanken-Grotesk, Hanken-Grotesk-SemiBold, 'sans serif', sans-serif
text.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(252,240,219); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1; text-decoration-thickness: 6.6667%; white-space: pre;

stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(252,240,219); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 0.77; text-decoration-thickness: 5%; white-space: pre;
text.tspan: Filming like a pro has never been easier. With the
VizoCam X1, just power on, capture, and share —

rect.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(252,240,219); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 0.15;

text.tspan: Turn on your VizoCam X1, attach it to your
helmet, tripod, or handheld mount, and choose
your settings. It’s ready in seconds.

text.tspan: Record in 5K Ultra HD, take HDR photos, or
buttery-smooth footage — even on the move.

text.tspan: Connect to your phone with one tap. Edit your
clips, add effects, and share your adventure
instantly with friends or social media.
